name: Deprecated
description:
A small arcade endless jumper game where you play as a robot destroying a facility that is falling apart.

Controls: A to move left, D to move right, space to jump. If you find a Roboforge, press E when standing in the box to open the upgrades menu, and E to close it again. Click any upgrade you have enough Nuts to buy to purchase it.

Another small game made in 1 day with my engine

Was meant to be for a 2-day jam with friends, but lost motivation and ideas after 1 day. My given theme was Falling Apart.
